verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Your singing moves and shakes the ground
Your beckon brings the rain in drought
Your glory spins the earth around
And Your whisper makes Your fire fall down

verse.name: p1
verse.lines:
There's no other name
The Name that stands through the ages

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
There's no other name, there's no other name like Yours
Jesus like Yours Jesus
There's no other name, there's no other name like Yours
Jesus, like Yours Jesus

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Your word commands the wind and waves
Your touch revives the sick and lame
Your power wakes the dead again
And Your love destroys the grip of sin
For Your love destroys the grip of sin

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
There's no other name, there's no other name like Yours
Jesus like Yours Jesus
There's no other name, there's no other name like Yours
Jesus, like Yours Jesus

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
Every knee will bow, every tongue confess
The Name of Jesus
Every knee will bow and every tongue confess
The Name of Jesus
Oh every knee will bow every tongue confess
The Name of Jesus
Oh every knee will bow and every tongue confess
The Name of Jesus

verse.name: c3
verse.lines:
There's no other name, there's no other name like Yours
Jesus like Yours Jesus
There's no other name, there's no other name like Yours
Jesus, like Yours Jesus
